## Step 6: Create SBA Variable

Stata code:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
gen sba=0
replace sba=1 if m3a==1 | m3b==1 | m3c==1
replace sba=. if m3a==9
```

R code:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
data$sba <- 0
data$sba[data$m3a==1 | data$m3b==1 | data$m3c==1] <- 1
data$sba[data$m3a==9] <- .
```
